sn35.64:1.1: Atha kho ayasma migajalo yena bhagava tenupasankami …pe…
sn35.64:1.2: ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma migajalo bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn35.64:1.3: “sadhu me, bhante, bhagava sankhittena dhammam desetu, yamaham bhagavato dhammam sutva eko vupakattho appamatto atapi pahitatto vihareyyan”ti.
sn35.64:2.1: “Santi kho, migajala, cakkhuvinneyya rupa ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya.
sn35.64:2.2: Tance bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosaya titthati.
sn35.64:2.3: Tassa tam abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosaya titthato uppajjati nandi.
sn35.64:2.5: santi ca kho, migajala, jivhavinneyya rasa …pe…
sn35.64:2.6: santi ca kho, migajala, manovinneyya dhamma ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya.
sn35.64:2.7: Tance bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosaya titthati.
sn35.64:2.8: Tassa tam abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosaya titthato uppajjati nandi.
sn35.64:3.1: Santi ca kho, migajala, cakkhuvinneyya rupa ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya.
sn35.64:3.2: Tance bhikkhu nabhinandati nabhivadati najjhosaya titthati. Tassa tam anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosaya titthato nandi nirujjhati.
sn35.64:3.4: santi ca kho, migajala, jivhavinneyya rasa ittha kanta …pe…
sn35.64:3.5: santi ca kho, migajala, manovinneyya dhamma ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya.
sn35.64:3.6: Tance bhikkhu nabhinandati nabhivadati najjhosaya titthati. Tassa tam anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosaya titthato nandi nirujjhati.
sn35.64:4.1: Atha kho ayasma migajalo bhagavato bhasitam abhinanditva anumoditva utthayasana bhagavantam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva pakkami.
sn35.64:4.2: Atha kho ayasma migajalo eko vupakattho appamatto atapi pahitatto viharato nacirasseva—yassatthaya kulaputta sammadeva agarasma anagariyam pabbajanti, tadanuttaram—brahmacariyapariyosanam dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja vihasi.
sn35.64:4.3: “Khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya”ti abbhannasi.
sn35.64:4.4: Annataro ca panayasma migajalo arahatam ahositi.
